name: Occupy Space
description:
Occupy Space is an arena SHMUP where you can't destroy enemies, only disable their movement. This means each enemy you hit will stay on screen and attack you. How many points can you score when each enemy you hit becomes a thorn in your side?

Enemies that you've disabled will not only attack you, but also hurl threats and insults. They are very important people, and they have been inconvenienced, and they will make very clear their displeasure.

WARNING: This game contains adult language. However, there is an optional TV Edit mode for those who dislike profanity.

The game is still in development, but is fully playable in its current state

ToDo:
-High Score List
-More enemies and insults
-General gameplay tweaks

Default Controls:

Movement: WASD / Left Analog Stick

Aiming and Shooting: Arrow Keys/Mouse/Right Analog Stick + Right Trigger

M - Mute

Esc - Quit to menu
